text:
Is it possible to set FOP's base directory? I would like to use relative paths 
to reference external files, for example in <fo:external-graphic 
src="file:..\image.gif"/>. But when I do so, I get the message "[ERROR]: Error 
while creating area : Error with image URL: ..\image.gif (System can't find 
specified URL) and no base directory is specified."
